metadata.title: CVE-2022-22935 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in SaltStack Salt in versions before 3002.8,3003.4, 3004.1. A minion authentication denial of service can cause a MiTMattacker to force a minion process to stop by impersonating a master.

criterions.comment: salt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
